method.name: IsInitialized
method.comment: Tests whether the object has been initialized.

method.name: _class_globals
method.comment: Class module Dropbox Chooser Library - Documentation is at https://www.dropbox.com/developers/chooser#android

method.name: _initialize
method.comment: Initialize the Dropbox chooser - Module and Eventname for the callback methods, appkey as provided by dropbox when registering your app.

method.name: _show
method.comment: Show the Dropbox chooser, ShowType should be one of: preview, direct or content in line with the Link Types in the API documentation

method.name: IsInitialized
method.comment: Tests whether the object has been initialized.

method.name: _initialize
method.comment: Initializes the object. You can add parameters to this method if needed.

method.name: _valueof
method.comment: Return the Constant for a given Constant String Text

method.name: _values
method.comment: Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared.

method.name: _valuestrings
method.comment: Returns an array containing a string representation of the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared.

method.name: IsInitialized
method.comment: Tests whether the object has been initialized.

method.name: _geticon
method.comment: URI to a 64px x 64px icon for the file based on the file's extension

method.name: _getlink
method.comment: URI To access the File, which varies depending on the link Type specified when the Chooser was triggered

method.name: _getsize
method.comment: Size of the file in bytes

method.name: _getthumbnails
method.comment: Set of thumbnail URIs generated when the user selects images and videos. It returns three sizes with the keys: 64x64px, 200x200px, And 640x480px. If the user didn't select an image or video, no thumbnails will be included.

method.name: _initialize
method.comment: Initializes the object. You can add parameters to this method if needed.
